DeftNotes: The Chrome extension designed to transform your browser into a powerful note-taking and organisational tool that keeps your thoughts and tasks aligned with your workflow.

Why DeftNotes?

Seamless Integration: DeftNotes lives right within your Chrome tabs, marrying convenience with efficiency. There's no need to toggle between apps or lose context by switching screens. Your notes are exactly where you need them, when you need them.

Contextual Note-Taking: Ever found yourself wondering why you bookmarked a page? DeftNotes provides context to your bookmarks and research. By allowing you to jot down notes directly on the web page you're viewing, it ensures that the why behind every tab is crystal clear.

Never Lose Track Again: With DeftNotes, every note is tied to the tab where it was created, making it effortless to revisit ideas and information. This tab-specific approach means you can jump back into your workflow or research without missing a beat, ensuring that no thought is left behind.

Streamlined Organisation: Say goodbye to scattered thoughts and hello to structured clarity. DeftNotes organises your notes by URL, so you can easily access related thoughts and information with a single click. Whether it's project details, study notes, or random musings, everything you need is organised and easily accessible.

DeftNotes Features:

Instant Note Capture: Click and type. It's that simple to capture your thoughts with DeftNotes. Whether it's a snippet of text, a pivotal idea, or a to-do list, your notes are saved instantly.

Editable & Deletable Entries: Change of plans? No problem. DeftNotes allows you to edit or delete your notes, so your digital workspace remains flexible and up-to-date with your evolving needs.

One-Click Access: Navigate to your saved notes with ease. DeftNotes not only remembers your notes but also the specific tabs they're associated with, providing a direct link back to the source.
